Class MarketplaceAPI

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class MarketplaceAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    API used to talk with the EMC marketplace API

      • init

        public static void init(MarketplaceAPI.LoginCallback callback)
        Initializes Marketplace API or does nothing if already initialized Prints out status to the System.out

      • checkLicensed

        public static MarketplaceResponse checkLicensed(EMCMod.EMCModInfo clientInfo)
        Checks if the product is licensed
        Parameters:
        clientInfo - the mod's info
        Returns:
        MarketplaceResponse with licensed status in MarketplaceResponse.success

      • checkLicensedSecure

        public static MarketplaceResponse checkLicensedSecure(EMCMod.EMCModInfo clientInfo,
                                                      java.lang.String secret)
        Checks if the product is licensed, securely The response will be the supplied secret, encrypted with the mod's private key

        To protect against response forging and emulation, verify that the decrypted response matches the supplied secret

        Parameters:
        clientInfo - the mod's info
        secret - a unique string (e.g. timestamp) that will be returned in the encrypted message
        Returns:
        MarketplaceResponse with licensed status in MarketplaceResponse.success and the encrypted secret in MarketplaceResponse.data

      • getKey

        public static MarketplaceResponse getKey(EMCMod.EMCModInfo clientInfo)
        Retrieves a product key if licensed
        Parameters:
        clientInfo - the mod's info
        Returns:
        MarketplaceResponse with the key in MarketplaceResponse.data

      • downloadMod

        public static MarketplaceResponse downloadMod(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves a mod if licensed
        Parameters:
        name - the mod name you want to download
        Returns:
        MarketplaceResponse with the mod's bytes base64-encoded in MarketplaceResponse.data

      • getLicensedModNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLicensedModNames()
        Retrieves a list with the names of all mods licensed to the user
        Returns:
        String array of the mod names
